English: How many people are in your family?
What time is the meeting tomorrow?
Spanish: ¿A qué hora es la reunión mañana?

English: I have two cats and a dog.
Spanish: Tengo dos gatos y un perro.
El tren sale a las 10:30 AM.

English: My sister is studying medicine in university.
Spanish: Mi hermana está estudiando medicina en la universidad.
